patient_name_address_telephone_and_hicn.description: PATIENT NAME, ADDRESS, TELEPHONE and HICN

supplier_name_address_telephone_and_nsc_.description: SUPPLIER NAME, ADDRESS, TELEPHONE and NSC or NPI #

name_and_address_of_facility_if_applicab.description:
NAME and ADDRESS of FACILITY if applicable
(See Reverse)

est_length_of_need.description: EST. LENGTH OF NEED (# OF MONTHS):

question_1.description: 1. Is the device being ordered for the treatment of obstructive sleep apnea (ICD-9 diagnosis code 327.23)?

question_2.description: 2. Enter date of initial face-to-face evaluation

question_3.description: 3. Enter date of sleep test (If test spans multiple days, enter date of first day of test)

question_4.description: 4. Was the patient's sleep test conducted in a facility-based lab?

question_5.description: 5. What is the patient's Apnea-Hypopnea Index (AHI) or Respiratory Disturbance Index (RDI)?

question_6.description: 6. Does the patient have documented evidence of at least one of the following? Excessive daytime sleepiness, impaired cognition, mood disorders, insomnia, hypertension, ischemic heart disease or history of stroke.

question_7.description: 7. If a bilevel device is ordered, has a CPAP device been tried and found ineffective?

question_8.description: 8. Enter date of follow-up face-to-face evaluation

question_9.description: 9. Is there a report documenting that the patient used PAP ≥ 4 hours per night on at least 70% of nights in a 30 consecutive day period?

question_10.description: 10. Did the patient demonstrate improvement in symptoms of obstructive sleep apnea with the use of PAP?

narrative_description.description: Narrative description of all items, accessories and options ordered; (2) Supplier's charge; and (3) Medicare Fee Schedule Allowance for each item, accessory, and option. (See instructions on back)
